Text: Tak abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef abogijo abo Lifai te̩wʼugbo E̩leaza atama kpai ugbo Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun kpai ugbo abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef abogijo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l;
oñ ma ka ñwu ma efu Shailo oj ane̩ Kenan le̩ kakini, Jihofa ñwate̩ lʼugbo Mose̩s ka ku ma ki kʼewo ewo ñw a kʼa dodo efu-wñ, kpai ane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka tod ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩-wa.
Tak abo Israe̩l mʼewo ewo-i kpʼokije̩ ki lʼo daka ko ñw abo Lifai kwef e̩wñ ogu e-ma, alu ki Jihofa ñwate̩.
Tak anya je̩ todu akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Kohat, Abe̩le̩ abo Aro̩n atama ku ma jʼef abo Lifai jʼewo me̩gwe̩ta kwef e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu Juda kpai e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu Simeo̩n kpai e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin.
Tak abo Kohat kibo̩ je̩ ewo me̩gwa kwef e̩wñ akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi o̩lo̩pu Ifraim kpai kwef e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu Dan kpai kwef e̩wñ ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu Manasa le̩.

Tak abo Ge̩rsho̩n jʼewo me̩gwe̩ta kwef e̩wñ akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi o̩lo̩pu Isakar kpai kwef e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r kpai kwef e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu abo o̩lo̩pu Naftali kpai kwef e̩wñ ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa efu Beshan.
Abo Me̩rari alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩ je̩ ewo me̩gweji kwef e̩wñ abo o̩lo̩pu Rube̩n kpai kwef e̩wñ abo o̩lo̩pu Gad, kpai kwef e̩wñ abo o̩lo̩pu Ze̩biulo̩n.
Tak abo Israe̩l mʼewo ewo le̩ manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼuma daka ko ñw abo Lifai alu kʼanya je̩ ñwu ma, alu ki Jihofa ñwate̩ lʼugbo Mose̩s.
Taku ma ño̩ mʼewo ewo kʼa kʼodu-ma jo̩-i ko ñwu ma kwef e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu abo Juda kpai kwef e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu abo Simeon,
abo-i chʼutodu amo̩ma Aro̩n kʼi dʼef akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Kohat ku ma chʼo̩lo̩pu abo Lifai; abu kʼanya je̩ todu ma ejodudu.
Oñ ma mu Kiriat-arba, oj ane̩ uwo Juda, manyu ane̩ ije̩ ki lʼowñ daka ko ñwu ma. Arba le̩ chʼata Anak le̩, (owñ che He̩bro̩n).
Ma muda mʼoko-wñ kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-wñ ko ñwu Kele̩b o̩ma Jefune kʼi ne̩ me̩.
Ma ño̩ mu He̩bro̩n ki chʼoke̩ko todu e̩ne̩ ki kpʼone̩ le̩ manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Libna ge̩ manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai Jatir manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai E̩shtemoa manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai Holon manyʼane̩ ile̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Debir manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai Ain manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka, kpai Juta manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka, kpai Be̩t-shime̩sh manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka ko ñw Aro̩n atama le̩: owñ chʼewo me̩la kwef abo o̩lo̩pu meji le̩.
E-kʼi la kwef e-o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin che Gibeo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Geba manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki To daka
kpai Anato̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Almo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka: owñ chʼewo me̩le̩.
Ewo ewo amo̩ma Aro̩n owñ chʼamatama o̩chaka-wñ chʼewo me̩gwe̩ta manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka.
Tak anya je̩ ewo ewo abo o̩lo̩pu Ifraim todu abo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Kohat, kʼi chʼabo Lifai le̩, owñ chʼamo̩ma Kohat kibo̩.
Ma mu She̩ke̩m, kʼi chʼewo oke̩ko̩ tod e̩ne̩ kʼi kpʼone̩, manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka oj ane̩ uwo Ifraim, kpai Geze̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka,
kpai Kibzaim manyʼane̩ ije̩ k lʼo daka kpai Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka ko ñwu ma: ewo me̩le̩ i che.
E-ki la kwef e-o̩lo̩pu Dan che, E̩l-teke manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Gibe̩to̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai Aijalon manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Gat-Rimon manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka: owñ chʼewo me̩le̩.
E-ki la kwef ukpe̩reji e-abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa che: Taanak manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Gat-rimo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka: owñ chʼewo meji.
Ewo ewo e-abo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma Kohat ki bo̩ chaka chʼe̩gwa, manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼuma daka.

Oñ ma mu Golan e-Beshan kʼi chʼoko e̩ko̩ manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Be-e̩shte̩ra manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka ko ñw amo̩ma Ge̩rshon ku ma chʼabo akwo̩ra unyiʼka ef akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Lifai kwef ukpe̩reji e-abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa: owñ chʼewo meji.
E-ki la kwef e-abo o̩lo̩pu Isakar che, Kishion manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka, kpai Dabe̩rat manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai Jarmut manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai En-ganim manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka: owñ chʼewo me̩le̩.
E-ki la kwef e-abo o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r che Mishal manyʼarie̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Abdo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai He̩lkat manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Rehob manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka: owñ chʼewo me̩le̩.

E-ki la kwef e-abo o̩lo̩pu Naftali che, Kede̩sh, e-Galili manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka, ewo kʼi chʼoke̩ko̩ todu e̩ne̩ ki kpʼone̩ le̩, kpai Hamo̩t-do̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Kartan manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki To daka: owñ chʼewo me̩ta.
O̩chaka ewo ewo abo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Ge̩rsho̩n chʼewo me̩gwe̩ta manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼuma daka.
Taku ma mu Jokneam kpai ane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Karta manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka,
kpai Dimna manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Nahalal manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka ko kwef e-o̩lo̩pu Ze̩biulo̩n ñw akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Me̩rari, ama chʼabo Lifai ki bo̩: ewo-wñ chʼe̩le̩.
Kwef e-abo o̩lo̩pu Rube̩n ma mu Bize̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Jahaz manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai Kedemo̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Me̩faat manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka ko ñwu ma: owñ chʼewo me̩le̩.
Oñ e-ku ma ko ñwu ma kwef e-abo o̩lo̩pu Gad che Ramo̩t e-Gile̩ad manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka, owñ chʼoke̩ko̩ todu e̩ne̩ kʼi akpʼone̩, kpai Mahanaim manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai He̩shbo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Jeza manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka; o̩chaka-wñ chʼewo me̩le̩.
Ewo ewo du kʼanya je̩ ñw amo̩ma Me̩rari alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩, ama chʼabo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi Lifai ki bo̩ la chʼewo me̩gweji.
Ewo ewo abo Lifai du ku ma jʼalumeji ane̩ kʼabo Israe̩l ne̩ le̩, chʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩jo̩ manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼuma daka.
Ewo ewo le̩ du nʼo̩ko ije̩-wñ kʼi lʼo daka; abe̩le̩ i de̩ ugbo ewo ewo-i chaka.
Abe̩le̩ Jihofa mʼane̩ chaka kʼi go̩ ka kʼi ako ñw amata-ma ko ñw abo Israe̩l; oñ abu ma mʼu gba ma kwo dodo jʼo̩mo̩.
Jihofa la mʼuñmi du ñwu ma ugbo du, alu du kʼi go̩ ñw amata-ma le̩; e̩ne̩ du ef ame̩nebi-ma chaka dago o̩gba-ma n; todu Jihofa mʼame̩ne̩bi-ma chaka ko nyʼuma o̩wo̩.
O̩la e̩nyo̩ du ki Jihofa ka tane̩ ñw abo unyi Israe̩l le̩, okate-wñ chi n; o̩chaka-wñ lewa che̩.
